name: HypoglycemiaUnawareness
title: Hypoglycemia Unawareness
description: A complication of diabetes in which the patient is unaware of a deep drop in blood sugar because it fails to trigger the secretion of epinephrine which generates the characteristic symptoms of hypoglycemia. (Business ID: Entry 1180740)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Hypoglycemia Unawareness.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an a complication of diabetes in which the patient is unaware of a deep drop in blood sugar because it fails to trigger the secretion of epinephrine which generates the characteristic symptoms of hypoglycemia..),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMEDCT codes for Hypoglycemia Unawareness.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Hypoglycemia Unawareness.)

contains.display: Hypoglycemia unawareness due to type 2 diabetes mellitus (disorder)
Hypoglycemic unawareness due to type 1 diabetes mellitus (disorder)
Loss of hypoglycemic warning due to diabetes mellitus (disorder)
